Attilla/Luzbel:::

"ATTACK!!!!"shouted Attilla, both males transformed to beast mode and 
they tried to bite RazorCraw


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Razor Claw stood poised to attack. his raptor legs were bent and 
his tail curled behind him ready to push him forward toward Attilla 
and Luzbel.
> 
> Bullet had seen the mutant in action and fealt bad for the two 
dragons. The former Trainer had sided with the mutant as a favor to 
Blaze but soon saw what he was capable of. Common sense told him he 
didn't want to enrage Razor Claw.
